Features:

Full LODs
Dirt Mapping
Breakable Glass
Better and Paintable Interior

Spawn name : suranoe

Credits:

Da7K : base car model (Surano GT)
Eddlm : Handling
Skysder : Spawn colors/carvariations
MyCrystals! : Mod Page Description
Sangckrona : Testing

Install:

1. Put the "spsuranoe" folder in mods\update\x64\dlcpacks
2. Add this line :
		<Item>dlcpacks:/spsuranoe/</Item>
to dlclist.xml (mods\update\update.rpf\common\data)
